#sea-ui-dialog-label-sessionstatus: Status of connection to the game session
#sea-ui-help-content-about: S.E.A. - is an addition to the game "Space Engineers", that allows you to control the game blocks, using "JavaScript", through a conventional browser on any modern device.
#sea-ui-help-content-terms:
• S.E.A. - Space Engineer Assistant.
  • World - The group of grids.
  • Grids - The group of control units.
  • The control object (Block) - Ingame terminal block for construction. Such as: motor, piston, lamp, etc.
  • Control unit - The interface object for interaction with the game blocks.
#sea-ui-help-content-how_it_works:
S.E.A. consists of three parts:
  • Server (SEA.CT) - works as a relay of commands from browser to game and back, and also stores settings of the worlds, grids and control units in a database "SQLite" database.
  • The client (SEA.Dashboard) - is the user interface, in the form of web pages, to interact with blocks the game..
  • Game script (SEA.GM) - accepts commands from the client and processes according to a pre-written script logic.

The client and game script contain API which is available for modifications.
#sea-ui-help-content-how_to_use:
• Indication of the status of connection with the server and game session - connected , trying to connect/disconnection , no connection .
  • To switch the language - Press the button and choose from the list. If your language is not listed, you may add it by translating the dictionary files. To do this, find and copy the files "lang_sea-ui_en_info.json" and "lang_sea-ui_en_dictionary.json" from the catalog "\web\data\" с with S.E.A. server. Replace new files language prefix, for example "lang_sea-ui_de_info.json" and "lang_sea-ui_de_dictionary.json".
  • Add world - Press the button , in the opened sidebar to fill the name and click "Add".
  • Add grid - Select world, press the button , in the opened side panel to fill in the name and to choose a game object from the list, click "Add".
  • Change the world or grid - Press the button , to set a mark on the item to edit, click , edit the fields of the world or grid, click "Edit".
  • Delete world or grid - Press the button , put a mark on the items to delete, press the button , confirm deletion.
  • Add control unit - Select grid, press the button , in the opened sidebar to fill in name and choose a control object (block) from the list, select a control (button, slider, etc.), fill in the settings of the control unit, click "Add".
  • Move control units - Press the button drag and drop items in desired position within the screen, press the button . The coordinates of the control units are remembered for each screen resolution.
  • Modifying and deleting control units - Press the button , click on the control unit. In the opened sidebar, edit the required settings, press the button "Edit" or click the button "Remove" to remove.

Attention!

* - If the contlol object list is empty, means no connection with the game; you do not have access to the contlol object.

* - The set of controls "S.E.A. multi-touch" do not support mouse control.
